product_name: The North Face GTD T-Shirt - Women's
long_description: Built with FlashDry(TM) fibers to wick moisture and enhance dry time, The North Face GTD T-Shirt for women makes reaching your fitness goals just a bit more comfortable. FlashDry fibers dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. Polyester wicks away sweat; natural particles in fabric resist odors. Mesh panels at sides and arms promote cooling airflow where needed. Reflective logos on The North Face GTD T-shirt help keep you visible and fabric offers a UV-protective rating of UPF 50+.
short_description: Built with FlashDry(TM) fibers to wick moisture and enhance dry time, The North Face GTD T-Shirt for women makes reaching your fitness goals just a bit more comfortable.
